snippet.title: Kobe Bryant ready to flush the 2013-14 season
snippet.description:
Kobe Bryant ready to flush the 2013-14 season by Mark Sandritter on Apr 16 2014, 6:11p
It's been a rough season for Kobe Bryant and he's had enough.

snippet.title: Dan on Fire: Kobe Bryant is the clear 2013-14 NBA MVP
snippet.description:
Dan on Fire: Kobe Bryant is the clear 2013-14 NBA MVP by Dan Rubenstein on Apr 16 2014, 11:18a
WSBN's Dan on Fire presents the very clear case for Kobe Bryant as this season's most valuable player.

snippet.title: The Hook's 2014 NBA Awards: Knicks failure, Gregg Popovich quotes, worst contracts and more

snippet.title: Los Angeles Lakers hoping for mutual split with Mike D'Antoni, per report
snippet.description:
Los Angeles Lakers hoping for mutual split with Mike D'Antoni, per report by Satchel Price on Apr 12 2014, 6:05p
The Lakers want a new coach, but would prefer not to fire their current one.

snippet.title: History, flexibility make Lakers' future brighter than it appears
snippet.description:
History, flexibility make Lakers' future brighter than it appears by Mark Deeks on Apr 11 2014, 2:36p
Even with a bare roster, the Lakers' cap room and market position put them in good position to retool faster than most teams.

snippet.title: NBA Y2K: The Kobes of past, present and future
snippet.description:
NBA Y2K: The Kobes of past, present and future by Jon Bois on Apr 17 2014, 12:43p
This season was full of injury and frustration for Kobe Bryant. In this episode of NBA Y2K, we're giving him a do-over of the season, and giving him a teammate he knows better than anyone. He will...

snippet.title: How far can Dirk Nowitzki climb up the all-time scoring list?
snippet.description:
How far can Dirk Nowitzki climb up the all-time scoring list? by Kevin Zimmerman on Apr 9 2014, 4:42p
How much further can Nowitzki move up the NBA's all-time career scoring list?

snippet.title: Lakers extend Mitch Kupchak's deal, Mike D'Antoni's future uncertain
snippet.description:
Lakers extend Mitch Kupchak's deal, Mike D'Antoni's future uncertain by Jason Patt on Apr 9 2014, 9:40a
The Lakers have faith in Kupchak to help turn things around, and one of the first order's of business will be to make a decision on D'Antoni.
